short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: THRESHOLD makes the new tab page your canvas, allowing you to make it both personalised and convenient

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: THRESHOLD is an open source extension that completely overhauls your new tabs, allowing you to create a fully customised homepage with easy access to your favourite websites and themed however you want.
